mil5.3.11:1.5_1: hatthacchedo pādacchedo vadho bandhanaṁ kāraṇā māraṇaṁ santativikopanaṁ,
mil5.3.11:1.5_3: na ca bhagavā arahati etaṁ vacanaṁ vattuṁ.
mil5.3.11:1.7_2: paggaṇhe paggahārahan’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.3.11:1.9_0: ‘niggaṇhe niggahārahaṁ, paggaṇhe paggahārahan’ti, tena hi ‘ahiṁsāya cara loke,
mil5.3.11:1.9_1: piyo hohisi maṁmivā’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.3.11:1.10_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.3.11:2.2_0: ‘ahiṁsāya cara loke, piyo hohisi maṁmivā’ti, bhaṇitañca—
mil5.3.11:2.4_1: piyo hohisi maṁmivā’ti sabbesaṁ, mahārāja, tathāgatānaṁ anumataṁ etaṁ, esā anusiṭṭhi, esā dhammadesanā, dhammo hi, mahārāja, ahiṁsālakkhaṇo, sabhāvavacanaṁ etaṁ.
mil5.3.11:2.6_0: ‘niggaṇhe niggahārahaṁ, paggaṇhe paggahārahan’ti, bhāsā esā, uddhataṁ, mahārāja, cittaṁ niggahetabbaṁ, līnaṁ cittaṁ paggahetabbaṁ.
mil5.3.11:2.7_0: Akusalaṁ cittaṁ niggahetabbaṁ, kusalaṁ cittaṁ paggahetabbaṁ.
mil5.3.11:3.1_1: idāni tvaṁ paccāgatosi mama visayaṁ, yamahaṁ pucchāmi, so me attho upagato.
mil5.3.11:3.3_2: paribhāsanīyo paribhāsitabbo, daṇḍanīyo daṇḍetabbo, pabbājanīyo pabbājetabbo, bandhanīyo bandhitabbo, ghātanīyo ghātetabbo”ti.
mil5.3.11:3.4_0: “Yaṁ pana, bhante nāgasena, corānaṁ ghātanaṁ, taṁ tathāgatānaṁ anumatan”ti?
mil5.3.11:3.7_1: na so tathāgatānaṁ anumatiyā ghātīyati, sayaṅkatena so ghātīyati,
mil5.3.11:3.7_2: api ca dhammānusiṭṭhiyā anusāsīyati, sakkā pana, mahārāja,
mil5.3.11:3.7_3: tayā purisaṁ akārakaṁ anaparādhaṁ vīthiyaṁ carantaṁ gahetvā ghātayitun”ti?
mil5.3.11:3.11_1: na coro tathāgatānaṁ anumatiyā haññati, sayaṅkatena so haññati,
mil5.3.11:3.11_2: kiṁ panettha anusāsako kiñci dosaṁ āpajjatī”ti?
